data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WppadyQj3X4Q7kNvgHhcx7D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDByRCVEjgqfjWu9hGLFPZpHkDZO-bDkpkaxja_p9e_UQ&oe=6669871C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=F6aoR5jashYQ7kNvgHiYNfx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBt0Gl7kaJEoQOLkCjEhPDyGCbjAwrX5XJqeQ-jlyZ-AQ&oe=666990A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fqr46Hk1cycQ7kNvgErV1Vs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBwKC1-6b5I7vSgc3PGHDsJyg9R3CwZ2A2vq-fsA7au8w&oe=66697807)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=r8OKizUQEtsQ7kNvgGNlRYb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBiwnnUaRK5j_oe2wYgWt3zre-DNFPaBT3ecYdwjdeZcA&oe=66696AE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KheyAvCtOfYQ7kNvgEdxt3I&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_kNbob1DU8iiOMrj_aGrpn1j63WTuF03agVFi8qDA9A&oe=66699758)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8XGOCtJ_yRMQ7kNvgHEDCQz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDExLCtW9pcG3T12XJcIp0BD-SNFe3C38jnXejuaXyx-A&oe=666993D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DN0g2ye3UWUQ7kNvgE5T0DS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA7hvbDQAVDNXiEiP_NB7G7DRbRk8I_RZLvfnUCoWoO7A&oe=666979F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CmWZdge6UJwQ7kNvgEJAluQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYADB7kG6jdVJuI2JenH52p5f_gTtyy0I3x4v-reoJ3yHA&oe=6669646A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tESzNvzkDFgQ7kNvgFS_J08&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDvHK2vtGA0mywhbJ9S53PpHAMIB_YhDY9tqnD0waQaTw&oe=66697817)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EEbkU4-XbYYQ7kNvgEK91Wh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBBZQJTRv1-Hus55zrNw0CuM59WuDXZnyWzURF7Duxr1Q&oe=6669938C)
